LANG_TextTooLongError.ENG:
The string you entered is too long! No conversion will be made." + "
 The string you entered had " + str(len(depuratedUserText)) + " valid characters, and " + str(bannedCharactersCounter) + " banned characters." + "
 For more info on this limitation, refer to the README.md
LANG_TextTooLongError.ESP:
El texto que ingresaste es demasiado largo! La conversion no se realizará." + "
 El texto que ingresaste tenía " + str(len(depuratedUserText)) + " caracteres validos, y " + str(bannedCharactersCounter) + " caracteres baneados." + "
 Para mas informacion sobre esta limitacion, lee el README.md
